text: Algeria was first at the Olympic Games in 1964. The International Olympic Committee's official abbreviation for Algeria is ALG. "Official abbreviations" at The Games of the XVIII Olympiad, Tokyo, 1964, [p. 9 of 409 PDF]; retrieved 2012-8-16. ==History== Since 1964, there has been an Algerian team in every Summer Olympic Games since, except for the boycotted 1976 Summer Olympics. Algeria has also sent athletes to the Winter Olympic Games three times. The National Olympic Committee for Algeria is the Comité Olympique Algérien started in 1963. ==Medalists== Medal Name Games Sport Event 1984 Los Angeles Boxing Men's light-heavyweight 1984 Los Angeles Boxing Men's middleweight 1992 Barcelona Athletics Women's 1500 metres 1992 Barcelona Boxing Men's featherweight 1996 Atlanta Athletics Men's 1500 metres 1996 Atlanta Boxing Men's lightweight 1996 Atlanta Boxing Men's middleweight 2000 Sydney Athletics Women's 1500 metres 2000 Sydney Athletics Men's 5000 metres 2000 Sydney Athletics Men's high jump 2000 Sydney Athletics Men's 800 metres 2000 Sydney Boxing Men's light-welterweight 2008 Beijing Judo Men's -90 kg 2008 Beijing Judo Women's -52 kg 2012 London Athletics Men's 1500 metres 2016 Rio de Janeiro Athletics Men's 800 metres 2016 Rio de Janeiro Athletics Men's 1500 metres ==Medal tables== ===Medals by Summer Games=== 1964 Tokyo 0 0 0 0 1968 Mexico City 0 0 0 0 1972 Munich 0 0 0 0 1976 Montreal did not participate did not participate did not participate did not participate 1980 Moscow 0 0 0 0 1984 Los Angeles 0 0 2 2 1988 Seoul 0 0 0 0 1992 Barcelona 1 0 1 2 1996 Atlanta 2 0 1 3 2000 Sydney 1 1 3 5 2004 Athens 0 0 0 0 2008 Beijing 0 1 1 2 2012 London 1 0 0 1 2016 Rio de Janeiro 0 2 0 2 2020 Tokyo 0 0 0 0 Total 5 4 8 17 ===Medals by sport=== Athletics 4 3 2 9 Boxing 1 0 5 6 Judo 0 1 1 2 Total 5 4 8 17 ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes ==References== ==Other websites== * Algeria profile at London2012.com Category:Sport in Algeria Category:Nations at the Olympics Category:National sports teams of Algeria
